name: Calendar Improved
description:
Improved, human friendly calendar

* Human friendly event time, with past and future wording
* Disabling of event deletion
* Dimming of past events, configurable opacity
* Collapsing of past events, showing only event time
* In progress badge for current events, configurable colours
* Upcoming badge for upcoming event, configural interval and colours
* Show/hide icons, configurable contextual icons for different event types
